name: tana-paste
title: Tana Paste
description: Converts text between Markdown and Tana Paste formats.
author: 3mdistal

commands.name: convert-markdown-to-tana-paste
commands.title: Convert Markdown to Tana Paste
commands.subtitle: Tana
commands.description: Takes Markdown text from your clipboard and converts it to Tana Paste format.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
